name: My Exit
description:
Everyone is on the train heading home.
You are waiting for the train to arrive at a certain station.
Will you make it home safely?


If you find something anomalies, please move to another car.
If you don't see anything anomalies, please take your seat.
Repeat until you reach the station.
When you find all the "anomalies," something may happen.


Game Features
2D game inspired by Exit 8 (Exit 8-like)
The basic movements are to move left and right, face up and down, and sit on a chair.
Some element of surprise and horror is included.
Sound is an important part of the game, so please adjust the volume.


Play time
more than 15 minutes


Controls
Keyboard and mouse
←→：Movement
Up/Down/Down/Down: Up/Down turn
Z・Enter: Decision key
Shift : Dash
ESC: Menu screen (volume and language settings are available)
Menu can be operated only with mouse
Sitting in a chair
　If you turn up on an empty chair, a balloon will appear.
　Pressing the Decision key in this state will allow you to sit down.
XBOX Controller
←→：Movement
↑↓：Turn up and down
A: Decision key
X R: Dash
Menu button: Menu screen (menu operation is supported only by mouse)

Video Distribution Guidelines
This game can be distributed by both individuals and corporations.
This game is an Exit 8-like game and has nothing to do with the original (Exit 8).
　Please do not write "Exit 8 sequel" or "◯ version of Exit 8" in the video or summary section.
　("Exit 8-like" are acceptable.)
We are not responsible for any damage caused by the distribution of this game.
These guidelines are subject to change without notice.
